choices: The Prey: either a Viera or Nu Mou.
1.content:
Ivalice is a world that has the mammal races Moogles, Humans, Viera and Nu Mou.

Ivalice also has large carnivorous reptiles such as Dragons and Bangaa that loves to eat mammals.

In this story you choose to be...

choices: A large male Bangaa that can easily over power his prey.
A beautiful female Bangaa that can seduce her prey.
11.content:
You chose Bangaa. They are a 7 foot tall bipedal reptile with two head flaps at the side of your head that covers your ear holes. Your head looks like a mix of a monitor lizard and a dragon. You have a naturally strong body.
You also discovered your favorite food is the other sentient beings in this world. You can stretch your jaw (to some extent) to help you swallow large meals.

Before you begin this story what gender are you?
11.title: You are a Bangaa.

choices: a fat, but still strong one
111.content: you are a proud strong male bangaa, but what kind of build do you have exactly?
111.title: A large male Bangaa that can easily over power ...

choices: IT'S THAT KLUTZ THAT STEPPED ON MY TAIL!!
1111.content:
Your a very muscular Bangaa. No one dares to mess with you after taking a glance at you, you your self are already rather unpleasant to talk to...They would fear that you would simply crush their heads if they were to bother you.

But your not the stereotypical "muscle-man", your smart and sometimes cunning. You are one of your clans most powerful fighters, but no one in your clan can even hold a candle to you in eating. Your jaw can stretch allowing you to stuff much more in your mouth than mear snacks...You could swallow a person whole if you wanted too.

You wake up on a beautiful day, you had a very nice sleep due to all the partying your clan did last night for a victory over another clan. You look out the window of the pub you are currently staying in and gaze down on the may comming and going races...Then you remember in that fight you had against the enemy clan, some clumsy Human stepped on your tail with his spiked boots...You can feel your anger start to raise, but then a massager knocks on your rooms door. You go to open it.

"What do you want?" you say in an annoyed tone. Marry, a little Moogle that recently joined your clan stands feet below you, she hardly even comes up to your knees.

"Oh, I'm sorry, did I interrupt something?" you then shake your head to answer no.

"Good, our leader has told me to tell you that we need supplies, and he has chosen you do go get them." she says formally.

"Fhheh...I knew he would choose me of all people, tell him he is quite the slave driver." you then say goodbye and close the door. So now that you've been ordered to go get supplies, you figure you have no real choice but to do such. So you leave to go to the local flee market.

You arrive there shortly and start to look around for potions and medical aids with tonics...Then you see some you've met before...
1111.title: Totally rip'd.

choices: Wait until he leaves the crowd and jump 'em!
Your too hungry for that, you just snatch him out of the crowd now.
11111.content:
You squint your slender Bangaa eyes to focus on one person in the large crowd and see a very irritating sight; it's the same guy that stepped on your tail when you were in that clan battle...MANY thoughts of revenge go through your head, how you could cause him so much pain if you only had the chance as punishment for impaling your tail with those spiked boots...But you notice your hungry, you pat your muscular belly to sooth it's roars for food for a moment.

You start to think of how easy it would be to snap him up in your mouth and swallow him down without his idiot mind not knowing the wiser, by the time he would get his bearings he would of already became a piece of shit. You mouth starts to water...Now your REALLY hungry, now you start to think of somekind of plan as to get what you ever so dearly want...A live struggling meal.

After afew minutes of plotting you decide your going to...
11111.title: IT'S THAT KLUTZ THAT STEPPED ON MY TAIL!!

choices: Damn it, whats with all the sneaking around? EAT HIM NOW!
Wait...If I'm to rush to him now, I'm SURE he'd hear me.
111111.content:
You decide that revenge can wait...For the moment, that is. Right now you have to do "clan shopping", but you keep a VERY close eye on your walking lunch.

About an hour after listening to him complain about a sword to a shop owner, you mearly shake your head in how sad it is that he doesn't realize that the reason why the sword isn't "working" is because he is far too weak to use it properly...After he walks sadly way, you follow him out of the shopping area and out into the road but you keep a fair enough distance from him...Far enough for him not to notice your muscular stomach growl.

By the looks of it, it seems he's let his guard down so he can fish through his pockets for some kind of trinket...Now is your chance.

So shall we be subtle or just tackle the dude and eat 'em?
111111.title: Like A Snake, I Wait And Strike.

choices: Torture him for what he did to your tail.
1111111.content:
You think about being subtle, but your stomach gives you a mental bitch slap and tells you to just eat him now...So without a second thought you CHARGE at him, almost kicking up dust as you run.

He hears strong and heavy steps coming from behind him, he quickly turns around to see what could cause such a noise...Could it be a monster? Well, close: he sees a large Bangaa with a very sinister look on his face charging right at him.

He twitches at first, rather shocked at your full on charge...But he quickly realizes that your not going to stop, and he turns around and sprints for his life. You see he is trying to run from you, and you speed up as fast as your scaly lags can take you.

Your at least two feet taller than him, so you naturally run faster. He looks over his shoulder and sees your catching up rather quickly and tries to go into max speed...But that dosn't help much.

Your just in arms reach of him, a small bead of sweat goes down the left side of your face. You then tackle him to the ground with your self ominously grinning over your prey.

He has a very scared look on his face, and you...
1111111.title: You WILL NOT get away!

11111111.content:
"Remember me? You stepped on my tail in that battle we were in..."

His face lits up with memory, and he quickly regrets not simply playing dumb.

"You remember don't you? Do you have any idea how much pain my poor tail has been in since that moment? It's been living hell...Now I'm going to make you feel every ounce of the same pain I've been having..." Your start to hiss with anger as you your self remember the horror it's been with your broken tail.

"It was an honest mistake...Can't you find it in you to forgive me...?" He pleads.

"You wish." You say, you then get off of him, kick him over with his stomach on the ground and put your wide musky dirty foot on the back of his head and press his face into the ground...Not enough to gag him but enough to make him eat through the dirt.

His protests are unheard through the dirt, and you decide that you will do something cruel before you swallow him up, so you...

111111112.content:
Smirking, you drop your trousers and turn around, crouching over him and then sitting on his face, enjoying the muffled cries of dismay.
"Like it?" You wiggle your hips back and forth, forcing him to rub his face on your fine, muscular ass. "This is where you'll be by tomorrow. This is where I'm letting you out. You'll be nothing but shit for me to drop in some stinking hole." You sit down a little harder, and he struggles wildly to try and force you off, mainly because you're suffocating him now. You crane your head back to look at him, weak and helpless, unable even to stop your butt from overpowering him. You smile wickedly, licking your lips. His face feels pretty good on your smooth backside, and his screams are stimulating, not to mention how good it feels to put him in his proper place. You start to feel pretty aroused, and sit a little harder before lifting up, his red face gasping for air.
"You like it? Huh? Answer me, you little shit!" You sit down again, and his renewed cries are even more pleasant now that he got some fresh air in his lungs. The next time you rise up, he answers quickly.
"Yes! Yes! It's the best ass I've ever seen! It's fantastic! Please, please let me go! I'll pay for a White Mage to fix your tail! You can sit on me anytime you like! Please don't eat me!" He's crying now, what a pussy!
"Ha! You little queer! You like my ass, huh? You wanna be my seat? Fag!" You sit down again, rubbing your butt up and down on his sobbing face. The next time you lift yourself up, he grabs your tail and starts licking it. You raise a fist to break his skull for hurting your already injured tail, but then notice that it does feel a little better now. The more he frantically licks and soothes it, the less painful it is. When he sees that you look slightly less angry, he lets go of your tail and reaches into his pocket pulling out a bag of money. "See? I can pay for a white mage! I'll do anything! Just don't kill me!"
Of course, you...

1111111122.content:
You get off of him and pull up your trousers and say to the weak human, "Just empty out your packs and pockets, then hand me your money, that way I will call it even."
The human frantically gets up and takes all of the potions, equipment, maps and lays them on the ground in front of you. You grab his arm that is handing out the money then pulls his face to your scaly abdomen and then chuckle saying "It is now even for you stepping on my tail... but I never said I will spare your life." your stomach releases a large growl on cue then you explain "I am still hungry and my stomach is begging for human."
With that said you were able to lift him up with one arm and stuff him face first into your large reptilian maw. You hug your belly feeling the human squirming to get free, you laugh and say to him "You are a weaker human then I thought, even moogles put up more a struggle in my gut." Suddenly you release a large *BELCH* that takes all of the air out of your gut so the human passes out, "Aww, the fun is over already, well back to the mission."
You search through his belongings he laid out a minute ago. All you find are junk armor, flimsy weapons, fifty gold coins, a map to the human's clan, and a few empty bottles of healing potion and you think "He must have been drinking the potions before I tackled him, that explains how he slightly healed your tail." you look down at your gurgling belly and say "Those potions heal minor cuts and not digestion, to bad for you."

1112.content:
You're a lithe, but strong Bangaa, a Bangaa Bista with lovely copper skin. You live in a city that is filled with many species, and many things to see and do and eat. And yet you prefer a very special kind of food. Specifically, humans. It started when you were playing around with a human friend named Zan, wrestling together in your house. Teasing him, you pretended to catch him with your ears, then your mouth. But it was much easier to hold his arm in your mouth than you expected. And before either of you knew what was happening, you were swallowing him down, and he was squirming in your stomach. You treated it like a joke, though he was worried; and yet the longer he was in there, the more he seemed to enjoy it. It was easy to hear what he was saying with your very sensitive ears, and he described it like being in a sauna, hot and wet and comfortable. Eventually, he fell asleep, and was peacefully digested by your stomach. You were upset at first about losing your friend, but you noticed the next day that you had grown just a little fatter. It had always been your dream to be seen as less scrawny, and now you had a way to do it. You began to get friendly with other humans, becoming a drinking buddy to many. At the end of a lot of nights, you would be the one to walk some poor drunk home. They usually made it there, but sometimes they would simply disappear. No one suspected you, as you were careful to only meet your marked meals halfway to their house before you lured them into a dark alley and swallowed them. Every one of them contributed to just a little more muscle mass, and they were always too drunk to care that they were being eaten, so there was no guilt. You were still thin, but growing more muscular.
Tonight, you...

"...I-I was just...*cough* sleeping...All of th-is just be...Cause I was sleeping...?" He forces out.

"My clan doesn't need slackers...Slackers are just food for our enemies, and why would I give food to the enemy? So I'll gobble you up so they don't have the chance too."

You start to open your mouth widely "Well, down the the hatch!" and drop him into your mouth. You gulp him down quickly as your belly just CAN'T wait anymore, you give him one last look of the out side world and swallow hard, the bulge travels down your neck and disappears at your chest but quickly reappears in your belly making it bulge slightly more than it usually does. "OooaAARRRUUPP!!" As your belch leaves your scaly lips you can only slightly hear his sobbing in your churning belly. You start to feel your self get sleepy, so you...
11132221112111111111.title: Out with the old and in with the new.

111322211121111111111.content:
You lightly rub your monstrous gut and burp afew times, happily enjoying how your meal fights for his life with what little power he has left. He pushes against your guts walls making alittle bump in the spot that he forces out, but you mearly play with his efforts of escape by pushing him back into the center of your belly. He is so weak now that now even your stomach is stronger than him, he slowly gives up hope and lets your belly force him into place, your stomach walls squeeze him tightly as it gets ready to turn him into belly fat.

He hopes that he'll run out of oxygen and faint so he doesn't have to feel the extreme pain of being digested alive, however you swallow air to keep him breathing...You want he to be awake for the living hell he is about to go through...

"Please...Have a heart, let me out!" Finally being about to speak normally after he got his wind back. "Nope, sorry, I'm too hungry for that!" You say cruelly as you swallow more air.

He starts to get coated in a layer of thick slime, not the stuff that burns though, but just as a warning that it's about to come. "Acid is coming in! Help me! Someone! HELP ME!!!" he starts screaming and hopes someone will save him and hopefully not get swallowed too. You just grin, no one is anywhere close enough to the tents to here a this fools pleeds...You stomach rumbles and churns, as a sign this is the end of his life.

Your not in the mood to hear his thoughts until the moment he dies, so you cast the spell Hibernate on your self and instantly go to sleep. You only set it to 4 hours so you don't worry your clan as to where you are. "Good night lunch." You say to your meal before you go to sleep.
111322211121111111111.title: Game Over.

choices: Erbakk finds you and has good news.
Your reconnaissance team is back with bad news.
1113222111211111111111.content:
After your planned four hours of blissful sleep are over, you slowly get up and try to get yourself fully awake. You stretch your arms up and release a long yawn, then you are almost fully awake.
You look down at your belly seeing that there is no longer a lump in you stomach, but there is now a smaller one in your intestines. Knowing that because you have a surprisingly fast and efficient digestive system your previous snack should be ready to be released in a few minutes.

Now that you have no reason to be the tent, you hurry outside. You look around quickly notice a few people coming your way.
1113222111211111111111.title: He is being digested now.

choices: The King Python is on the move.
The king Python is guarding his territory.
11132221112111111111112.content:
Your reconnaissance team is made up of six Viera, but only four are have just returned from looking for the King Python in the wilds, they all have a mix of fear and sadness look on there faces.

When they get to you one tries to speak but because she is crying you can barely make out what they are saying. All you understand in between crying and whimpers is, "We found the beast... it ate the two others... after we tried to kill it ourselves".

You comfort them and explain to them there friends death will not be in vain, and that they can take a long break after you calm down and tell Erbakk and I what exactly happened.

Soon you find Erbakk in the base camp and you both hear what the happened to the other Viera.

You find out where the snake is and that...
11132221112111111111112.title: Missing Viera teammates.

choices: Attack it with everything you've got.
111322211121111111111122.content:
You hear from Erbakk that King Python is currently guarding it's territory, fend and feeding off of anyone one to invade it's living space. You get up and move to the exact spot it was last seen...Holding your swords handle with anger.

About four miles later, you finally arrive at the plains with a large gloomy cave ever so eerily looming over you. You pull your sword out of it's sheethe and get into a defensive stance.

"Come out beast, I am he to end you!" You shout into the cave.

You hear a silent hiss that gets slowly louder, and out comes King Python...With a large bulge in it's stomach, you know without a doubt it's the probably dead reconnaissance Viera. It wasn't long before they were both eaten, so you think that maybe there is a slim hope of saving them from death if you kill the beast and cut them out of it's belly, so you...
111322211121111111111122.title: Time To Slay The Monster.

111322211121111112.content: You get up, and before he can get away, you bring your foot down hard on his head pile driving it into the ground. You feel your bladder getting full, and want to humiliate him more, but then you hear stomach roar. Do you finally eat him or give him a golden shower?
111322211121111112.title: Step on him, make him eat dirt.

choices: You decide to check on your teammates
11132221112111112.content: "no," you think, "better put him out of his misery now and eat him." the slacker is relieved once you get off him, but then he notices the hungry glimmer in your eye, tries to run, and fails as you tackle and then slowly devour him, savoring every limb. After your meal...
11132221112111112.title: "Nah, thats TOO cruel."

1113222111211112.content: You decide to break his arms and legs, but not to eat him because you're not hungry. So you tackle him, pin him, and proceed to break his legs so he can't get away, then you break his arms, you think about going to check on how the mission is going, but then you think you could also tear off his dick so he never has kids again.
1113222111211112.title: Smash his limbs with your physical strentgh.

choices: Wait for him to finish digesting
Go check on the rest of your group
111322211121112.content: While he's still drowsy you grab him and start to shove him down your gullet. When he realizes whats going on, he is already halfway in your stomach,although all his thrashing does hurt your throat and stomach you swallow him in no time at all.
111322211121112.title: Swallow him now. The belly needs more food.

111322211122.content: You decide that two little kids and a skinny girl aren't filling enough, so you go to the house two blocks away and finish off your midnight snack with six kids, a dog and a parent. You go back to the pub and your new weight makes the floorboards groan, you try to tiptoe past your clanmates and go to bed full and content.
111322211122.title: Never mind...I'm still hungry...

choices: the enemy warrior captured after a battle.
the thief who has been stealing supplies.
11133.content:
Erbakk, who is one of your lieutenants and a good friend, comes in with a smug grin on his face. "Sir we have successfully caught someone I know who you will be interested in seeing".

You think to your self, this day is starting off great because now you get to punish someone to start your day. "So Erbakk, bring the captive in. And why did he/she get captured in the first place?"

Erbakk explains the the person is...
11133.title: A captive is a good way to start the morning.

choices: Release him, he seems honest enough to recruit into your army.
111331.content: ''He is an enemy that we have decided to take captive after a recent battle. They fought with admirable strength but we prevailed.'' The warrior was brought in in full armour and put to his knees. He was exhausted and showed it. One of the guards removed his helmate revealing his blooded face and brown hair. The guards also removed his armour, anything that their army could use or sell. You look him over and find that he has a strong build. Good. You like them that way. He looks at you with an unreadable expression and you ask him ''Who do you work for?'' He didn't answer. One of the guards smacked him on the back of his head with the pommel of his sword. ''Talk!''. Erbakk pushes the guard back a bit ''Vyncent, that is no way to treat our guest.'' Vyncent looked sorry ''I apologise, it'll not happen again, Ser.'' Erbakk kept a keen eye on Vyncent. You asked again ''Who do you work for?'' in a kinder tone. He replied ''I work for no-one. I am a common sellsword.'' He looked down at his knees, expecting some sort of torture. What do you decide to do?
111331.title: The enemy warrior captured after a battle.

111332.content:
The thief is drag over to you in chains by two of your soldiers. You can tell the captive is tired but still is trying to put up a fight, hoping to escape from you.

So is the thief a male or female?
111332.title: The thief is brought before you.

choices: Akyra and I did steal from your clan.
1113322.content:
The prisoner stops fighting and looks at your scaly face with no fear in her eyes. You just chuckle and tell your men "Thanks for bringing me the thief... now go back to your duties so I can have some private time with her." They follow your orders and quickly leave the room, while you sit by the prisoner who is kept in a kneeling position because of the weights.

You say to the chained thief "I have not seen a female bangaa like you in a long time. Because my missions are mainly in mammal territory." you sigh as you reminise about your time back in your bangaa village before you became the leader of a clan. You snap out of it and look at her determined face "Hmm, since you are a fellow bangaa I will go easy on the punishment.

You take of the muzzle restraint so she can talk, "So tell me who are you and why you are here."
1113322.title: A Young Adult Female Bangaa.

11133222.content:
The green female bangaa smirked and said "My name is Akyra, and I did steal from your clan... I am surprised that your men are so unprofessional to not tell you what I did... unless the punishment fits any crime."

You laugh as she found the answer to her own question then her, "This is my clan, so stealing from my clan is like stealing from me." A evil grin went across your face "So what did you take?"

Akyra grinned back at you showing no fear even though she is chained up and helpless, she responded "I took some clothes and swords from one of your Vierra tents. I got away with that, but I went back for some food... then someone alerted your guards that I was the thief from before."

You are surprised that this young female bangaa is not begging for her life, but instead being fearless and honest. You say to her "Your personality show me that you have a fighting spirit and a attitude that is needed in my clan. So instead of punishing you, I will make you stay at my side so you could become anything from a lieutenant to a sex slave depending on how you act the next few days."

You undo the chains and free her while saying, "What skills can you bring to the clan?"
11133222.title: Akyra and I did steal from your clan.

111332222.content:
Akyra explained "I only have one power that I was given by a demi-god dragon for saving his priestesses from a bear a few years ago. I was granted the ability to swallow people whole." She grabbed her bottom jaw and pulled it down, quickly the jaw detached into sections and stretched as far as she pulled. Akyra released her jaw and it reset itself then she said "I was planning to eat a few of your moogle mages earlier, but I was caught by five of your soldiers, and now I am here."

You laugh thinking your lucky day, you have always wanted another bangaa to feast with you and this one is a female so you can have fun two ways. You open the door and yell out for your teammate Erbakk to get a mission and come back here quickly.

Akyra walk over to you and pokes your fat scalie belly and says "Since you are a bangaa also you got this fat because of all the meat you eat... you are large enough to naturally stretch your mouth... and probably have eaten as many opponents as you can get away with."

"You are very curious..." You say as you step away from her. "but yes I got this gut from swallowing people whole, not just opponents though because children are tasty. Just do not tell anyone here about our eating ability."

Suddenly Erbakk opens the door and hands you a mission which is...
111332222.title: A evil blessing.

choices: You go into town to find what you want.
You go to the forest outside of town to find what you want.
112.content:
"Yaaawwn". You yawn as you wake up and get out of your luxurious bed. (You can afford expensive furniture because you know exactly how to get what you want from the citizens of this town, because of your sexy scalie physique).
You put on a robe over your slender body and a band around your tail, before you walk over to the window. You sigh "What a perfect view". Your house is on the edge of town, to the left is a large city and to your right is a forest that young adventurers normally go into.

As you are admiring the view you feel your stomach growling loudly. You glance down at your empty reptilian belly "I have not ate anything since I met a human a few days ago. Ah he was delicious." A little bit of drool drops down your scaly maw as you recall his taste and how good it felt when he was inside you.
You decide you want to devour live prey again, because you enjoy it squirming down into and around your stomach.

But where do you want to go to get it?
112.title: The Sexiest Female Reptile Around.

choices: Solona, and you decide to go to the Inn.
Tahira, and you decide to get some back alley snacks.
1121.content:
You enter the town wearing only shorts and a leather vest which shows off your female bangaa flat chest (you are a reptile so you do not have any mammaries).
You say to yourself quietly, "What to do and where to go?". You know that there is a dark alley where bums hangout that no one would notice that they went missing but there is also a local Inn where the owner lets you eat the rich customers as long as she gets a cut of what is left behind.


So which is your choice and what is your name?
1121.title: Town for fresh food.

choices: You choose what race is behind door number two.
11211.content:
You enter the Inn and walk through the tavern section until you find her. "Hey Solona, it has been a few days since you visited how have you been?" your friend Ananda said happily as soon as she spotted you. Pulling up a chair beside your best friend Ananda you respond "I have been doing okay, I have spent the last week sampling a few flavors at the forest near home. Unfortunately since you own this Inn you could not join me"

Ananda looked down at your flat stomach and heard your stomach gurgle "You knew I was busy today, so you came here to get some free food." she said slyly.
"Ananda you know me all to well." you said to her while quietly laughing.
She slides you two keys and explains "The key for the first floor has two rich NuMu, While the key to the second floor has a vacationing guild leader that is still worn out from his recent battle, unfortunately I do not know what race he is because I did not check him in."


Which key to take?
11211.title: Ananda's Inn.

choices: The guild leader is a Human mage.
The guild leader is a... large male Bangaa.
112112.content:
You quickly snatch the key to the guild leader thinking "It could be less of a meal then the NuMu, but the guild leader is vulnerable and should have a lot gold." Leaning over to Ananda you nuzzle the other bangaa's snout and say "Maybe next time we could have some fun together."
Suddenly someone calls for Ananda to help with some customers, she quickly tells you "Be careful and leave the loot in the room while you can keep the gold." then she goes back to work.

You stare at her rump and tail as she walks away and you start day dreaming "If only I was not too embarrassed to... ask that sexy reptile to be my mate." On cue your belly loudly gurgles which reminds you that there is no reason to day dream with a empty stomach. So you rush to the guild leaders room and silently open the door and see that the leader is a ____
112112.title: Choose the mystery meal.

choices: Large male bangaa awakes and asks you why are you here.
He just turns in his bed and continues to sleep.
1121122.content:
You silently slip into the room, quickly looking around the room you see that the guild leader has a chest of gold and a full armor and weapons rack. The sight brings a large evil grin to your face and you think "If I do this then I will be rich enough to add onto my house." Then you take a closer look at the guild leader still sleeping and snoring loudly, he is a large muscular Bangaa who is a few feet taller then you and many times the heavier. You contemplate second thoughts "I have never ate another bangaa before... should I do it... he is my race... but I am hungry."

Suddenly the guild leader moves and you gasp as...
1121122.title: Maybe you should have choose the NuMu.

choices: Spend the night in the room.
11211222.content:
You let out a sigh of relief knowing that a Bangaa of that size could easily rape and swallow you. Finally made your decision "I have not eaten someone of my own race before but I am hungry and he is vulnerable. I do not know if my jaws can stretch around him or even if my stomach can expand enough to hold him... well there is one way to find out.".

Your slender female bangaa body quietly moves around the males loot to get to the bed, pulling the blanket off reveals that his naked reptilian body. Since the faster you devour him the less of a chance he has to fight back you decide that there is no time too savor the taste, so you get on the bed and gently grab the males large arms and carefully stuff his hands into your scaly maw. Now start swallow the bangaa's arms but his muscles already force your jaws to stretch and separate to get them in, you think "He does not taste bad at all, not as good as human though." Surprisingly the male is still sleeping as you position his head facing you before another long gulp sends it into your salivating jaws. Soon you swallow his shoulders which makes it so your jaws and go closer together since all that is left is smaller parts or this large male. Within a minute all left of him outside of you is his tail, so you finally get a chance to savor his flavor for a few seconds before the last swallow sends all of the guild leader into your belly.

You lay on your side and look at the bulge in your stomach and too your surprise it is stretched at least three times the size as your body and the prey is still asleep. So you rubbed your overly stuffed belly and say "I will let you sleep as long as you digest well."

Now that you had a meal what are you going to do?
11211222.title: He just turns in his bed and continues to sleep.

choices: You try to sneak out at night.
112112221.content:
You think to yourself, "There is no way I can go home like this. Even if I was strong enough to move everyone would know I have eaten someone when they see me."
chuckling to yourself you imagine how someone would see you, a slender female bangaa with shiny scales and a gut stretched out much bigger then her body.

Suddenly the guild leader you ate starts to move and you hear him say "WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED, WHERE AM I?"

Before you could answer you release a huge belch which forces out all the air from your stomach. You shrug and decide that it is best if you just rest now since it will increase your digestion rate. You hug your massive gut and use it as a pillow "I wonder what Ananda would think when she finds out what I ate."

Hours later you wake up and...
112112221.title: Rest and Relaxation... and digestion.

1121122211.content:
The sun light hits your eyes and you wake up from your long sleep. You open your eyes and see that it is the sun rise already.

"I was wondering when you are going to wake up." a familiar voice said happily. A smile comes across your face as you turn to see your best friend Ananda.

You yawn and ask "How long was I asleep?" Ananda chuckled, "Well you got your meal before noon and woke up the next day.. so about twenty hours.

She rubs your still large gut. "So what did you eat anyway?" You grin, well there was a large male bangaa who was the guild leader." You look down at your gut and see that even though it is big the mass is now in your large intestine. You say mockingly "Seems that the leader is about ready to come..." Unfortuantly you are innterrupted when you suddenly release a loud fart that blows the covers off the bed.

You blush "Sorry about that... I should go to the restroom now."
1121122211.title: Ananda is in the room.

choices: Have more gassy fun with her.
Go ahead and release your prey from your bowels.
11211222111.content:
As you try to get up Ananda grabs your arm and says. "Solona do not go since I have a special place to put guild leaders."

A confused look goes over your face as Ananda pulls out a large pot that was inside the room closet. "I keep the remains as trophies... to remind me of who my friends and I have ate that are well known."

You say to her surprised, "So you want me to crap in that?" Ananda walks over to the end of the bed and says "That is not all I want." She quickly nuzzles her head under your large gut and noses your anus.
A large smile goes across your face as you know what she wants. So you push down on your gut releasing a loud long fart that fills the room with noxious gas.

You decide to...
11211222111.title: Ananda grabs your arm "No."

112112221111.content:
After that, Ananda slowly climbs up on the bed right next to you, taking her index finger and slowly traces over your bloated belly, smiling seductively as she extends her tongue and licks you across your cheek. "Come on now, don't hold out on me...." said Ananda as she begins to prod at your belly. You blush profusely (about as much as a reptilian monster can) and as if on cue, you push deep into your belly and release a gargantuan belch right in Ananda's face. Closing her eyes as the stench wafted over her, she inhaled deeply, enjoying the putrid scent of the Guild Leaders' half-digested remains.

"Like that?" you ask, giving your belly a hearty slap. Ananda merely nods as she climbs on top and begins to rub your grumbling belly firmly, working out a series of loud belches from within your gut.

Suddenly your belly rumbles violently...
112112221111.title: Have more gassy fun with her.

choices: A male human is screaming in fear because he is being attacked by a wolf.
A Viera broke her leg and is screaming in pain.
1122.content:
A few minutes after entering the forest you hear a loud screaming in the distance. You rush towards the noise to find out what or who made it. As you are running you think to yourself "Breakfast came sooner than I thought".

In a small clearing in the forest you find out who made the noise. It was...
1122.title: Going to the forest. Who is screaming.

choices: Uh oh! She didn't hurt herself, you've wandered into a crossfire!
11222.content:
You think to yourself what a stroke of luck this is. The rabbit-woman probably wouldn't fall for your charms, but she's in no condition to escape.

"Hurt yourself? Well that won't last long." You advance on her openly.

Her reaction is to ready a rapier. "S-stay back! There's no reason for you to be here!"

Well if she's going to be so hostile, there's no reason for you to keep up a charade either. "I thought your people were supposed to be accepting of the natural order?" you've reached the edge of her blade's length.
11222.title: A Viera broke her leg and is screaming in pain.

choices: They don't show. Looks like you can have her.
112222.content:
"Are you blinded, Bangaa? There's nothing natural about this." She gestures down at her bad leg, which you suddenly realize has been pierced through with an arrow.

Uh oh. You couldn't see anyone else when you entered the scene, but a battle needs two sides. The opponents must be either Snipers, Assassins, or both.
112222.title: Oh ****!

1122221.content:
Abruptly, you feel as if you were being cut apart by phantom energies. Your last realization is that you've suddenly dropped to the floor, and there are two viera looking down at you.

"Arrogant fool. Bangaa may be near the top of the food chain, but they have no means of matching our lethality." The assassin looks back up at the fencer. While she may not be your prey, she still has no chance of survival. "Now, where were we..."
1122221.title: Last Breath

1122222.content:
You quickly put your back to a nearby tree for protection while still having the wounded meal in view. After a few minutes of being cautious you decide that now is the time to grab your meal and run just in case her opponent is out there.

"CAREFUL LIZARD, MY OPPONENT CAN KILL YOU EASILY SO YOU..."
*Thud*
You threw a large rock at the Viera and knocked her unconscious with a direct hit to the forehead. You sigh, "I wanted to shut her up but now she will not struggle when I eat her." You steal yourself as you finally dash out and grab the bunny-girl and run her out of the forest back to your home.

"Finally that is the last of that mess." You say as you close your door. "I will wait until my prey wakes up so I can enjoy the meal."

A minute later a knock is heard at the door. It is a Viera and you quickly realize the arrows in her quiver are the same type that pierced the still knock out prey.

The Viera says nicely, "I saw that you have brought a wounded fencer into you home, she is a wanted person so where is she?"
You quickly show her to the room and say "I was about to operate on her to heal the arrow wound.. I am dabbling in Bishop skills."
She chuckles and explains "You were about to heal a wanted criminal, good thing I came here before you wasted your time." The Viera patted you on the back "Sorry to say this but I need to take her head with me when I leave."
You sadly respond, "I understand... I do not get many visitors here... can you stay for some tea?"
The bunny girl shrugs "Okay, I will just wait here for it just in case she wakes up."

As you left the room and start making some drinks you are laughing on the inside, "I cannot believe she fell for it! Oh I am glad I did not stay in the forest or else she would have killed me for my true intentions." You add some tranquilizers to the teapot while making the drink. You gently pour her a glass as soon as you give her a cup. "This mix has a mild relaxant, it helps warriors after a long battle. So I thought this is the best type for you."
The Viera gives a friendly smile and quickly downs the tea and says "I was more thirsty then I thought than...
*thud.*
She falls asleep before finishing the sentence and unfortunately she cracked her head when she fell on the table. You sigh thinking "I wanted live prey, now I have one dead and one unconscious."

Which are you going to eat first?
1122222.title: They don't show. Looks like you can have her.

12.content: Ok, so what kind of Dragon are you?
12.title: The Predator: Dragon

125.content: Ok so are you male or female?
125.title: A young and egar dragon

1251.content: Your an Ice Drake living in the mountains on the hunt or some fresh prey. You maybe small but your appitite isn't as you see something or someone coming at you. You find a...
1251.title: Young Ice Drake on the hunt

131.content: Are you a male or female child?
131.title: Child

132.content: Are you male of female?
132.title: Teenager

133.content: Are you male of female?
133.title: Adult

15.content: More prey choices Nu Mou or Viera.
15.title: more choices

info.brief_description: In FinalFantasyTacticsAdvanced. Bangaa and dragons are predators, everyone else is prey.
info.description:
This is a vore story I decided to make from the game Final Fantasy Tactics Advanced. You start by choosing your pred or prey then a race or a monster from the game.
Almost anything goes in this story, I will rarely delete chapters. Have fun.
info.pretty_title: Hungry dragons, and even hungrier Bangaa
